name: Octagonal Disorder
description:
A bullet-hell game where you move don't move the player, but the level!

Use the left and right arrow keys to rotate the level, and the up key to move it faster. You can also use the spacebar to launch your player into the air. Esc to quit if you've downloaded the game.

This game was made in 3 hours for a challenge video! It's not meant to be a masterpiece and has a few bugs and rough edges, so please keep this in mind!
